copy.text3: If you previously registered at any other Disney sites, you can %0A log in here using your exisiting Account ID and Password.
copy.text6: If you haven't created a Fairy yet, sign up now. It's free!
copy.text10: You need a Fairy to enter Pixie Hollow!
copy.confirmremove: Are you sure you want to remove this Fairy?
copy.invalidLogin: Sorry. Your login or password is not correct. Please try again.
copy.serverProblem: Pardon our pixie dust! We may be experiencing issues with our login. Please try again later.
copy.loyaltyTopCopy: You've been a Member of Pixie Hollow for
copy.loyaltyTopCopy_day_0: We're so excited you have become a member!
copy.loyaltyBottomCopy_0: As a thank you for becoming a member, we have given you a wooden Member Pin!
copy.loyaltyBottomCopy_1: Your wooden Member Pin now has lovely copper plating! We also hope you enjoy 15 extra wardrobe slots, 3 new profile backgrounds and 10 extra slots for storage items.
copy.loyaltyBottomCopy_2: Your copper Member Pin now has beautiful silver plating! We also hope you enjoy 15 extra wardrobe slots, 3 new profile backgrounds and 10 extra slots for storage items.
copy.loyaltyBottomCopy_3: You silver Member Pin now has gorgeous gold plating! We also hope you enjoy 15 extra wardrobe slots, 3 new profile backgrounds and 10 extra slots for storage items.
copy.loyaltyBottomCopy_4: Your Member Pin has a new jewel! We also hope you enjoy 15 extra wardrobe slots, 3 new profile backgrounds and 10 extra slots for storage items.
